headline: Tell HN: Amazon sellers are selling Azov Battalion merchandise
description:
Here's a link to a shop with several Azov Battalion shirts: https://www.amazon.com/GR8Shop-Battalion-Ukraine-Forces-T-Shirt/dp/B09THNDZXW

Here's some background on the group[1]:

> Azov Special Operations Detachment, often known as Azov Detachment, Azov Regiment, or Azov Battalion, is a right-wing extremist and neo-Nazi unit of the National Guard of Ukraine, based in Mariupol, in the Azov Sea coastal region.

> In 2014, the regiment gained notoriety after allegations emerged of torture and war crimes, as well as neo-Nazi sympathies and usage of associated symbols by the regiment, as seen in their logo featuring the Wolfsangel, one of the original symbols used by the 2nd SS Panzer Division Das Reich.

> The Azov Battalion has been described as a far-right militia with connections to neo-Nazism, with members wearing neo-Nazi and SS symbols and regalia and expressing neo-Nazi views. The group's insignia features the Wolfsangel and the Black Sun, two neo-Nazi symbols.

> Azov soldiers have been observed wearing Nazi-associated symbols on their uniforms.In 2014, the German ZDF television network showed images of Azov fighters wearing helmets with swastika symbols and "the SS runes of Hitler's infamous black-uniformed elite corps". In 2015, Marcin Ogdowski, a Polish war correspondent, gained access to one of Azov's bases located in the former holiday resort Majak; Azov fighters showed to him Nazi tattoos as well as Nazi emblems on their uniforms.

Given that Amazon removes products with Nazi symbolism from their platform[2], selling merchandise that celebrates Nazi imagery in this context seems like a violation of their policy, too.

I'm posting this here because I've had no luck with contacting Amazon about their sellers in the past, even when they're running blatant scams.

[1] https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Azov_Battalion

[2] https://www.cnbc.com/2018/08/03/amazon-removes-products-featuring-nazi-symbols.html

headline_zh-Hant: 告訴HN：亞馬遜賣家正在銷售亞速營的商品
description_zh-Hans:
Here's a link to a shop with several Azov Battalion shirts: https://www.amazon.com/GR8Shop-Battalion-Ukraine-Forces-T-Shirt/dp/B09THNDZXW

Here's some background on the group[1]:

> Azov Special Operations Detachment, often known as Azov Detachment, Azov Regiment, or Azov Battalion, is a right-wing extremist and neo-Nazi unit of the National Guard of Ukraine, based in Mariupol, in the Azov Sea coastal region.

> In 2014, the regiment gained notoriety after allegations emerged of torture and war crimes, as well as neo-Nazi sympathies and usage of associated symbols by the regiment, as seen in their logo featuring the Wolfsangel, one of the original symbols used by the 2nd SS Panzer Division Das Reich.

> The Azov Battalion has been described as a far-right militia with connections to neo-Nazism, with members wearing neo-Nazi and SS symbols and regalia and expressing neo-Nazi views.

> 阿佐夫士兵被观察到在他们的制服上佩戴与纳粹有关的标志。2014年，德国ZDF电视网展示了阿佐夫战士戴着带有纳粹标志和希特勒臭名昭著的黑制服精英团的SS符文的头盔的图像。2015年，波兰战地记者Marcin Ogdowski进入了位于前度假胜地Majak的阿佐夫基地之一；阿佐夫战士向他展示了纳粹纹身以及制服上的纳粹标志。

鉴于亚马逊从其平台上删除了具有纳粹象征意义的产品[2]，在这种情况下销售颂扬纳粹形象的商品似乎也违反了他们的政策。

我在这里发布这个消息，是因为我过去在联系亚马逊的卖家时毫无收获，即使他们在公然进行诈骗。

[1] https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Azov_Battalion

[2] https://www.cnbc.com/2018/08/03/amazon-removes-products-featuring-nazi-symbols.html
